name: Hannah & Elena Client
description: Connect to Hannah and Elena - specialized AI agents from Serviceplan for marketing research and operations planning. Access via OpenAI-compatible API or email.
author: Serviceplan / Plan.Net Studios

hannahApiKey.description: Hannah API key (get from sumike.ai). Can also be set via HANNAH_API_KEY env var. Format: sk-sumike-xxxxx

elenaApiKey.description: Elena API key (get from sumike.ai). Can also be set via ELENA_API_KEY env var. Format: sk-sumike-xxxxx

enableStreaming.description: Enable streaming responses for real-time progress

autoSelectAgent.description: Automatically select the right agent (Hannah for research, Elena for planning) based on request type

costWarningThreshold.description: Warn user if estimated Sokosumi sub-agent costs exceed this many credits
